TestCaseMetaData.name: M08_Update_Add
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The Laboratory Test Compendium from Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory is a subset of their Directory of Services. It is based upon the most commonly ordered lab tests by Dr. Radon. This compendium is being used by Dr. Nicholas Radon's practice EHR-S to place orders electronically to Century Hospital's Clinical Laboratory. Century Hospital has made the following changes to their test compendium: - Added a stool culture, colony count and antibiotic susceptibility tests. Century Hospital's LIS transmits the appropriate eDOS update messages with these changes to Dr. Radon's EHR.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: EDOS_1.0_1.1-M08_New and EDOS_1.0_2.1-M10_New and EDOS_1.0_3.1-M04_New and EDOS_1.0_4.1-M18_New_Approved and EDOS_1.0_5.1-M18_New_Limited have been uploaded.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: eDOS M08 data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support a M08 update message - action: addition Demonstrate capability to support for an OM3 segment. Demonstrate capability to support the repeating field in OM3-5 (Abnormal Tests/Codes for Categorical Observations), OM4-3 (Container Description), OM4-4 (Container Volume), and OM4-5 (Container Units). Demonstrate capability to support repeating segments for OM4.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: Update changes for addition of new individual observations.
